raw_body: MOTHA LEELA (nee PEREIRA) – Beloved wife of the late Nazarene Xavier Motha,​ cherished mother of Christine (Jayasinghe) and Manuela,​ loving mother-in-law of Amal Jayasinghe,​ adored grandmother of Navin,​ Himanshi and Pravin,​ beloved sister of the late Jasmine (Gomez),​ the late Joe,​ Daisy (Gomez),​ the late Eugene and Chandra. Safe in the arms of Jesus on February 18. A private funeral was held at the Roman Catholic section of the General Cemetery,​ Borella on February 19th 2024.            013565
